subject: Television
Reality Television
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Olympic swimming star Michael Phelps will race the N.B.A. superstar Shaquille O’Neal in a new TV reality show, “Shaq Vs.” on ABC.
snippet: The U.S. Olympic swimming star Michael Phelps will race the N.B.A. superstar Shaquille O’Neal in a new TV reality show, “Shaq Vs.” on ABC.
